name: Memory Fruits
description:
Classic fun memory game
Choose your difficulty level and improve your memory by matching pairs of cards : 12, 16, 20 or 24 cards
39 differents hand-drawn fruits images, with specials and uncommon fruits
Contains high score menu and mute sound button

Playable with mouse or touchscreen

We're junior developers, thanks for feedbacks... ;-)

Hope you'll enjoy  !
